title: opl vods
body: so i don't know a lot about website and how they work, but i just went onto the opl site to watch the legacy vs hellions match cos i missed it yesterday due to work but it says its unavailable? like this is 24 hours after it has been played why is it taking so long to up load it on a riot supported site? i feel like this just shows poor site management which is not good for a region that is trying to grow.

replies.body:
Hi Darth!

This is something we're trying to get better at so I apologise. We're aiming to always get them up the next morning. We'll make sure these get put on the site today. In the mean time you can check out the Youtube channel. They'll still only generally appear here the next morning due to the time to cut, process and upload the vids after the games.
Thanks Cpt. Much appreciation, good to see that riot sees this as a problem as well

The big vod is uploaded automatically so will be on the Youtube channel. The cut VOD's go up the next day and are then linked to from the site. Here's the VOD for the entire show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vArbIflJG8k

Just try googling it next time and you will generally find something

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VE0z593C3nY
yea thats what i did end up doing but i still think its kinda bad that the official website of opl can't even up load it within 24 hours
